ygData.subject: Mossy Rat Pelts
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi gang, I just started a Halfling Druid named Pistashio and I m somewhat working on the newbie armor quest. I m having trouble with part of it that requires
ygData.messageBody:
Hi gang,

I just started a Halfling Druid named Pistashio and I'm somewhat working on the newbie armor quest. I'm having trouble with part of it that requires Mossy Rat Pelts. I have obtained several Ruined and undamaged rat pelts but no plain ol' mossy. All the research I have done seems to suggest the diseased rats drop these so I have been hunting them for about a week now and no pelts. Does anyone know if they do drop them, if they are rare, no-drop and such? Any info would be greatly appriciated. :-)

Thanks!
--
